channel.title: Termite on Panic! at the Kernel
channel.description: Recent content in Termite on Panic! at the Kernel

item.title: Unknown Terminals and Remote Hosts
item.description: For quite some time now I’ve been using i3 as my (tiling) window manager of choice. When I just started using it, I’ve coupled it with rxvt-unicode (aka urxvt) only because I noticed many other users of i3 were using it. In a certain point of time after using urxvt, I started to look for an alternative terminal that will be easier to configure and will support copy & paste to and from the clipboard out-of-the-box.
